homePage.title: The Tor Photography
homePage.subtitle: Capturing Love Stories With Elegance
homePage.aboutText: I'm Tor, a wedding photographer passionate about capturing authentic moments filled with love, joy, and timeless beauty. My approach is natural and elegant — telling your story through images that last a lifetime.
homePage.ctaText: I would love to hear about your wedding plans. Let's capture your story together.

contactPage.intro: Have a question, collaboration idea, or just want to connect? Reach out through any of the channels below — I'd love to hear from you.
